page.title: 16Acknowledgements
page.content: The field work and research which have been involved in producing the statistical details and information for this area was carried out by the boys and girls of class 8(1985)of Burton Upon Stather County Primary School,Burton Upon Stather,Scunthorpe -Ruth,Katy,Catherine,Beverley,Nicky, Hannah,Helen,Marc,Melanie,Julie,Matthe w.F,Michelle.H,Paul,Stephen,James,Ben, Mark.J,Katie,Genghis,Phillip,Michelle. R,Tina,Kevin,Nicholas,Victoria,David,M aria,Rachel,Andrew,Mark.W,Matthew.W,Jo nathan,Mandy,Rachel and Heidi.In their work the children were helped by members of the Women's Institute, Mrs.Chivers,Mrs.Clark,Mrs.Hunter,Mrs.A shton,Mrs.North and Mrs Hitchin and parents Mrs.Foster,Mrs.Porter and Mr.Hope.This project was part of their curriculum during their last Summer term at this school.
